channel.title: Rep -- for requesting a blank server?
channel.description:
i was recently looking for a blank 508 server and couldn't find one using the search bar or manually looking. so i decided to post a topic requesting a blank 508 server. well i posted it in the wrong section accidentally so i made a new one in the serer help section. anyway this guy (noobs are ftw) reads it and rep -- me for requesting when i couldn't find what i was looking for. can he do this? i don't think he should be allowed to do this.
lol and I'm an idiot, this kid must be retarded then V noobs are ftw (+27/-186) attk mast3r (+10/-9) -1 u cant request at all read the fucking rules fucking idiot - mscp In topic 18 June 2010, 18:18:33

item.title: Rep -- for requesting a blank server?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire

@Javafire wrote:

attk mast3r:

shut up =p this kid needs to get rep reset, or banned.

this kid knows a hell alot more than you

Read full topic

item.title: Rep -- for requesting a blank server?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

attk mast3r:

it doesn’t that’s the thing, so to me that means it’s ok.

You are wrong, sir. Does murdering someone with a lightbulb make an exception to the law, just because it doesn’t state the exact weapon they have to be murdered with? No. There are no requests, period.

Reputation is just a number and does not matter here. Get over it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep -- for requesting a blank server?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Really? should I post the reasons I have been rep–, you really do need to read the rules before posted, and maybe this wouldn’t happen dumbass.

“david7147 (+10/-42) krackkid (+10/-200) -1 your youtube vids suck dick, your fat - mscp In topic June 21, 2010, 02:11:52 PM”

“i weed i_ (+10/-18) krackkid (+10/-200) -1 You suck to much of ur dads dick, Fag. - mscp In topic June 12, 2010, 11:13:41 PM”

“Aeolian. (+10/-29) krackkid (+10/-200) -1 - - mscp In topic May 09, 2010, 10:06:47 PM”

“EO9 (+10/-42) krackkid (+10/-200) -1 blacky poop nigger u better hope ur mommy dont see this - mscp In topic May 04, 2010, 03:44:06 AM”

“IceTICKER (+10/-10) krackkid (+10/-200) -1 :)<3 - mscp In topic January 15, 2010, 06:39:06 PM”
[hr]
Just don’t worry about rep you can get it back. Its only a number.
